Better Call Saul.name: Better Call Saul
Better Call Saul.creator: Vince Gilligan & Peter Gould
Better Call Saul.cast: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Michael McKean, Giancarlo Esposito, Tony Dalton
Better Call Saul.desc: BCS is the top of my favourite TV series. Its plot, cinematography, sound design, editing, acting...everything is the best on television. It's just a masterpiece!

Community.name: Community
Community.creator: Dan Harmon
Community.cast: Joel McHale, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi, Yvette Nicole Brown, Alison Brie, Donald Glover, Ken Jeong, Chevy Chase, Jim Rash
Community.desc: The crazy plot, interesting cultural references, and unique humor are the reasons that I enjoyed the show a lot. I am keeping in mind a saying in the show 'six seasons and a movie', and I hope to see it this year!

Bojack Horseman.name: Bojack Horseman
Bojack Horseman.creator: Raphael Bob-Waksberg
Bojack Horseman.cast: Will Arnett, Amy Sedaris, Alison Brie, Paul F. Tompkins, Aaron Paul
Bojack Horseman.desc: When I first start Bojack, I felt the jokes were terrible and pace was weird. But soon, the feeling changed. I started to connect with the characters in the show, and it just makes me laugh through tears. It also makes a brillant series finale, which is very rare in many shows.
